author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Eid's first day has been ended with the highlights of memorable Pak-Indo clash
@asportstvpk has given us treat today by sharing the memories of beloved win
We will never forget but will always miss this win
Thank you @asportstvpk
#Eid2022 https://t.co/z4k9Mfkp6I

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
✅114 against India
✅193 against South Africa
✅ Fifty against Australia in T20 World cup Semi-final
And the list is still incomplete and there is a lot to come in this list
Happy birthday🎂 🎉 Fakhar Zaman"Fakhar-e-Pakistan"
Stay blessed, stay happy
#HappybirthdayFakharZaman https://t.co/OttLPAQOQG

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Birthday Boy is giving gift to entire Pakistan nation
A treat with 200 international wickets and ICC ranking is here to celebrate
Eagle is on his way to fly higher and higher
Thanks 🦅 for making us proud Happy Birthday 🎂
#ShaheenShahAfridi https://t.co/UQct7nLkiC

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
On this day, the King of the new ball was born
The ruler of white ball as well as red ball was born
On this day, Eagle "Shaheen Shah Afridi" was born
Wishing you a very happy birthday my Lahori captain
May u have a happy long life and successful cricket career
❤️❤️ https://t.co/sGDR0HMnBA

text:

text:

text:

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Napoleon said: "Give me an educated mother, I will give you an educated nation"I know who is Napoleon, because he knew what is a woman
Every woman in the world whether she is a mother, daughter, sister or wife is respectable
Happy Women's Day

text:

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Your action suits you hero👍👍

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Proud of my Captain Shaheen Afridi ❤️👏

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:

text:

In front of public and behind the public👏👏 https://t.co/gKb6NKca2S

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Fully ready to see the battle between two ICC winners against each other. One is the captain of defending champions while other is the youngest captain of the League

My vote is for @lahoreqalandars

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
Still there is a lot to improve the PSL Anthem
Much better than 6th edition's anthem. Our Singers Atif Aslam and Aima Baig both tried their best and even the singers who sung the anthem before these guys also gave their 💯% but Ali Zafar has his own level
#PSLAnthem #LevelHai https://t.co/xXuBmQ7MTF

author: Hifza Ayaz
text:
The year has been changed but Shaheen Afridi's spell against India is still here to celebrate
The moments are still in our ❤️ and memories and we can't forget them until we see his that spell again and defeat India again
#ICCAwards https://t.co/Ci1dwXMOxE
